name: Potent Potables Online Quiz | Wines, Beers and Spirits | 10 Questions

questions.text: What is the name of a drink made with scotch and drambuie?
questions.explanation:
Rusty Nail.

	Belly up to the bar

questions.text: Since 1975 what has replaced scotch as America's best selling booze?
questions.explanation:
Vodka.

	Drinks like people change with time

questions.text: What maker of scotch guarantees the taste right on the bottle?
questions.explanation:
Chivas Regal.

	Straight from the horse's mouth

questions.text: What is the name of a Scotch Manhattan?
questions.explanation:
Rob Roy.

	They all sound good

questions.text: Which Johnny Walker scotch is called extra special? Black label or Red label?
questions.explanation:
Black label & black.

	Flip a coin

questions.text: How many years is Johnny Walker black label aged?
questions.explanation:
12.

	Got to wait a long time for this drink

questions.text: How many masts are on the ship pictured on a Cutty Sark label?
What is the best selling premium scotch in the United States?
What is the name of the drink made with scotch,vermouth and bitters?
Of bourbon,rye or scotch which matures quicker?
questions.explanation:
Bourbon.

	Pick that if you're in a hurry
